snippet: TJX, the company behind T. J. Maxx, Marshalls and other discount stores, said that it had named its president, Ernie Herrman, chief executive.
abstract: TJX announces president Ernie Herrman is named chief executive and will succeed Carol Meyrowitz at end of January 2016.
lead_paragraph: TJX, the company behind T. J. Maxx, Marshalls and other discount stores, said that it had named its president, Ernie Herrman, chief executive.

headline.main: TJX Names Its President to Chief Executive Post
